entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
